title: Kaspersky firewall help
body:
Okay, both my PC and my Laptop have kaspersky but I'm only getting this problem on my laptop.  Can't figure out why.  When I launch the game I get this:

http://i.imgur.com/yZqe04z.jpg

1.  I've got a tedious workaround where every patch I have to add firewall exceptions.  I don't do this on my PC and I don't want to keep doing this on my laptop.
2.  Disabling my firewall isn't an option.

replies.body: The black screen is usually caused by connection problems when the network can't reach our servers.  It's possible that an outside program could be blocking you, but in those cases I don't believe the patcher would have even launched.  Regarding your firewall, you can download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your settings and hopefully allow access.  I also recommend checking out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case you may be able to troubleshoot or change some settings around for a fix.  I hope that helps!
No luck.  I tried the connection issues page the other night and the hextech repair tool didn't work.
